item.text: When he saw the crowds, he went up the mountain. After he sat down his disciples came to him.
Then he began to teach them by saying:
“Blessed are the poor in spirit, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them.
Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth.
Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they will be satisfied.
Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy.
Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called the children of God.
Blessed are those who are persecuted for righteousness, for the kingdom of heaven belongs to them.
Blessed are you when people insult you and persecute you and say all kinds of evil things about you falsely on account of me.
Rejoice and be glad because your reward is great in heaven, for they persecuted the prophets before you in the same way.
“You are the salt of the earth. But if salt loses its flavor, how can it be made salty again? It is no longer good for anything except to be thrown out and trampled on by people!

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> of <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>. A <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="2749" class="">located</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="3735" class="">hill</st> <st data-num="1410">cannot</st> be <st data-num="2928">hidden</st>.

People<n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2545">light</st> a <st data-num="3088" class="">lamp</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> a <st data-num="3426" class="">basket</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="3087" class="">lampstand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2989">gives light</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>.
In the same way, let your light shine before people, so that they can see your good deeds and give honor to your Father in heaven.
“Do not think that I have come to abolish the law or the prophets. I have not come to abolish these things but to fulfill them.

I<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="3928" class="">pass away</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="2503" class="">smallest letter</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2762" class="">stroke of a letter</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="3928">pass</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="1096">takes place</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">anyone</st> who <st data-num="3089" class="">breaks</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1646" class="">least</st> of <st data-num="3778">these</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teaches</st> <st data-num="444" class="">others</st><n id="1" /> to do <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> will be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1646" class="">least</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="302" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">obeys</st> them <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teaches</st> <st data-num="444" class="">others</st> to do <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> will be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.
For I tell you, unless your righteousness goes beyond that of the experts in the law and the Pharisees, you will never enter the kingdom of heaven!
“You have heard that it was said to an older generation, ‘Do not murder,’ and ‘whoever murders will be subjected to judgment.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3710" class="">is angry</st> with a <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">subjected</st> to <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">insults</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> will<st data-num="1510" class=""> be</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">brought</st> before<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> ‘<st data-num="3474" class="">Fool</st>’<n id="5" /> will <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="1777" class="">sent</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fiery</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="1437" class="">So then</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="4374" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="2546">and there</st> you <st data-num="3415" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>,

<st data-num="863" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="1715">in front of</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st>. <st data-num="4412" class="">First</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> and be <st data-num="1529">reconciled</st> to <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> and <st data-num="4374" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gift</st>.

<st data-num="1510">Reach</st> <st data-num="2132" class="">agreement</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5035" class="">quickly</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="476" class="">accuser</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">while</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">way</st> to court,<n id="2" /> or he<n id="3" /> may <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5257" class="">warden</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will be <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5438" class="">prison</st>.
I tell you the truth, you will never get out of there until you have paid the last penny!
“You have heard that it was said, ‘Do not commit adultery.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="991">looks at</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1937" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3431" class="">has</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="3431">committed adultery</st> with <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">causes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4624" class="">sin</st>, <st data-num="1807" class="">tear</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1807" class="">out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">throw</st> it <st data-num="906" class="">away</st>! It is <st data-num="4851">better</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> than to have <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1067" class="">hell</st>.<n id="1" />
If your right hand causes you to sin, cut it off and throw it away! It is better to lose one of your members than to have your whole body go into hell.
“It was said, ‘Whoever divorces his wife must give her a legal document.’
But I say to you that everyone who divorces his wife, except for immorality, makes her commit adultery, and whoever marries a divorced woman commits adultery.
“Again, you have heard that it was said to an older generation, ‘Do not break an oath, but fulfill your vows to the Lord.’

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">take oaths</st> <st data-num="3654">at all</st>—<st data-num="3383" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,

<st data-num="3383" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">by</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5286" class="">footstool</st>, and <st data-num="3383" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="935" class="">King</st>.<n id="2" />

Do <st data-num="3833" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">take an oath</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4675" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="1410" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4160">make</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3189" class="">black</st>.
Let your word be ‘Yes, yes’ or ‘No, no.’ More than this is from the evil one.
“You have heard that it was said, ‘An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.’

<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st>, do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="436" class="">resist</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evildoer</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="4474" class="">strikes</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="4600" class="">cheek</st>, <st data-num="4762" class="">turn</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">as well</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> if someone <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="2919">sue</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5509" class="">tunic</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="863" class="">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> have your <st data-num="2440" class="">coat</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> if <st data-num="3748" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="29" class="">forces</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> to <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="3400" class="">mile</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>.
Give to the one who asks you, and do not reject the one who wants to borrow from you.
“You have heard that it was said, ‘Love your neighbor’ and ‘hate your enemy.’

<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st>, <st data-num="25">love</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588">those who</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecute</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>,

<st data-num="3704" class="">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1096">be</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">like</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">since</st> he causes <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> to <st data-num="393" class="">rise</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1026" class="">sends rain</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="94" class="">unrighteous</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="3588">those who</st> <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="5209" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>? <st data-num="3780" class="">Even</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collectors</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="846" class="">same</st>, <st data-num="3780" class="">don’t</st> they?

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="4771">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4053" class="">more</st> do you <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>? <st data-num="3780" class="">Even</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="1482" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="846" class="">same</st>, <st data-num="3780" class="">don’t</st> they?
So then, be perfect, as your heavenly Father is perfect.
